channel.title: Save-the-Date on Developer Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Save-the-Date on Developer Portal

item.title: Espressif Summit Brazil 2025
item.description: On August 5th and 6th 2025, Campinas (Brazil) will host the second edition of the Espressif Summit Brazil, featuring talks, workshops, and exhibitions focused on IoT, digital security, hardware, software, and connectivity.
